import { useState } from "react"; import Router from "next/router"; import useRequest from "../../hooks/request"; import Button from "../../components/Button/Button"; export default () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const { sendRequest, errors } = useRequest({ url: "/api/users/signup", method: "post", body: { email, password, }, onSuccess: () => Router.push("/"), }); const onSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); await sendRequest(); }; return (
Register {errors}
{errors.first_name}
{errors.last_name}
{errors.email}
{errors.password}
); };
